mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM (SELECT DISTINCT t_SPEC.SUPP_ID, t_LIST.EFFECT_FLAG FROM supp_list AS t_LIST INNER JOIN supp_spec AS t_SPEC ON t_LIST.SUPP_ID = t_SPEC.SUPP_ID) AS t_WHOLELIST INNER JOIN effect AS t_EFFECT ON t_WHOLELIST.EFFECT_FLAG = t_EFFECT.EFFECT_ID;

SELECT DISTINCT t_WHOLELIST.SUPP_ID, t_WHOLELIST.LOCATION, t_WHOLELIST.PRODUCT, t_EFFECT.EFFECT FROM (SELECT t_SPEC.SUPP_ID, t_SPEC.LOCATION, t_SPEC.PRODUCT, t_LIST.EFFECT_FLAG FROM supp_list AS t_LIST INNER JOIN supp_spec AS t_SPEC ON t_LIST.SUPP_ID = t_SPEC.SUPP_ID) AS t_WHOLELIST INNER JOIN effect AS t_EFFECT ON t_WHOLELIST.EFFECT_FLAG = t_EFFECT.EFFECT_ID LIMIT #{pageBegin},#{pageScale}

SELECT t_SUPPRECOMM.LOCATION, t_SUPPRECOMM.PRODUCT, t_SUPPRECOMM.LINK FROM (SELECT t_LIST.LOCATION, t_LIST.PRODUCT, t_LIST.LINK, t_LIST.EFFECT_FLAG, effect.EFFECT FROM (SELECT DISTINCT supp_spec.LOCATION, supp_spec.SUPP_ID, supp_list.EFFECT_FLAG, supp_spec.PRODUCT, supp_spec.LINK FROM supp_list INNER JOIN supp_spec ON supp_spec.SUPP_ID = supp_list.SUPP_ID) AS t_LIST INNER JOIN effect ON t_LIST.EFFECT_FLAG = effect.EFFECT_ID) AS t_SUPPRECOMM WHERE t_SUPPRECOMM.EFFECT_FLAG = #{EFFECT_FLAG};
mapper.delete: DELETE supp_comp, supp_list, supp_side, supp_spec FROM supp_comp LEFT JOIN supp_list ON supp_comp.SUPP_ID = supp_list.SUPP_ID LEFT JOIN supp_side ON supp_comp.SUPP_ID = supp_side.SUPP_ID LEFT JOIN supp_spec ON supp_comp.SUPP_ID = supp_spec.SUPP_ID WHERE supp_comp.SUPP_ID = #{SUPP_ID};
mapper.select: SELECT t_SPECLIST.SUPP_ID, effect.EFFECT FROM (SELECT t_SPEC.*, supp_list.EFFECT_ID FROM (SELECT SUPP_ID, PRODUCT, MANUFACTURE, DOSAGE, FREQUENCY FROM supp_spec WHERE SUPP_ID = #{SUPP_ID}) AS t_SPEC INNER JOIN supp_list ON t_SPEC.SUPP_ID = supp_list.SUPP_ID) AS t_SPECLIST INNER JOIN effect ON t_SPECLIST.EFFECT_ID= effect.EFFECT_ID;

SELECT t_SPECCOMP.SUPP_ID, component.COMPONENT FROM (SELECT t_SPEC.SUPP_ID, supp_comp.COMPONENT_ID FROM (SELECT SUPP_ID, PRODUCT, MANUFACTURE, DOSAGE, FREQUENCY FROM supp_spec WHERE SUPP_ID = #{SUPP_ID}) AS t_SPEC INNER JOIN supp_comp ON t_SPEC.SUPP_ID = supp_comp.SUPP_ID) AS t_SPECCOMP INNER JOIN component ON t_SPECCOMP.COMPONENT_ID = component.COMPONENT_ID

SELECT t_SPECSIDE.SUPP_ID, sideeffects.SIDEEFFECT FROM(SELECT t_SPEC.SUPP_ID, supp_side.SIDEEFFECT_ID FROM (SELECT SUPP_ID, PRODUCT, MANUFACTURE, DOSAGE, FREQUENCY FROM supp_spec WHERE SUPP_ID = #{SUPP_ID}) AS t_SPEC INNER JOIN supp_side ON t_SPEC.SUPP_ID = supp_side.SUPP_ID) AS t_SPECSIDE INNER JOIN sideeffects ON t_SPECSIDE.SIDEEFFECT_ID = sideeffects.SIDEEFFECT_ID;
